definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
eyeball/fig. the apple of one's eye (i.e. favorite person)

sentences.english: Clean up any beads of mercury by using an index card and plastic dustpan.
sentences.chinese: 用撲索引卡和塑料簸箕清理水銀珠子。

sentences.english: Jack was threading beads onto a string.
sentences.chinese: 傑克正在把珠子穿成一串。
偵探長的眼珠子都凸出來了。

sentences.english: Objective To establish the extract technology of selecting Rhizoma Panaois Majoris total saponin.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立珠子參總皁苷的提取工藝。

sentences.english: And now the water is like these marbles.
sentences.chinese: 這樣水就像這些珠子一樣。

sentences.english: There are many other designs of pin-tumbler besides the standard round or pointed tips.
sentences.chinese: 除了標準的圓頭和尖頭珠子外還有很多不同種的設計。

sentences.english: One, is an openwork silver bead that can only be accessed through the holes in the metal gridwork.
sentences.chinese: 是一個銀質的鏤空的珠子，可以通過轉動打開它。
眼鏡後面的眼珠子突凸出來。

sentences.english: The beads were strung on very fine nylon.
sentences.chinese: 珠子被串在十分細的尼龍絲上。
和一盆有趣的眼珠子花。

sentences.english: She strung the beads with a fine nylon.
sentences.chinese: 她用細尼龍線把珠子串了起來。

sentences.english: The garment is studded with pearls.
Beads of water cling to its screen, necklaces unstrung.
sentences.chinese: 水珠粘附在後門的紗屏上，就像鬆開了的項鍊珠子。

sentences.english: This magical ruthenium-plated necklace features a strand of sparkling crystal beads in Jet Hematite.
sentences.chinese: 鍍黑鉻色項鍊串起閃耀的黑礦色水晶珠子。

sentences.english: His face was beaded with sweat.
In this photo, we see scratches where the pick tool was used to lift the pin.
sentences.chinese: 在插圖中我們可以看到單鉤在撥動珠子是留下的劃痕。

definition: weight/pendant/same as 墜胡|坠胡[zhui4 hu2]/ballad singing accompanied by a 墜胡|坠胡[zhui4 hu2]
